1426:16: analpakalpāsaṃkhyenāpi mārgāntareṇādhigamyaṃ vajrayānopāyayuktānām ihaiva janmani anāyāsasādhyasthira-sarvabhāva [svabhāvam],
1426:24: ca mahāvajrayānaṃ samastayānottamamāgamaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na pratipadyante,
1426:26: tatra prajñopāyaparigṛhītā rūpādayo viṣayāḥ paribhogabhāvamāpadyamānāḥ viśiṣṭaphalāvāhakā bhavantītyavaśyameva prekṣāvadbhirabhyupagantavyam |
1426:27: viśiṣṭā hi sāmagrī viśiṣṭameva phalaṃ janayatīti sarvavādiprasiddham |
1426:29: punaḥ kṣīrāvasekādimadhikaṃ kāraṇamāsādya tadeva madhuratayā pratīyate |
1426:30: tadevaṃ - yathā kāraṇāntarābhisaṃskṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ viśiṣṭaphalāvāhakatvena pratyakṣeṇaiva dṛśyate,
1426:31: evamete rūpādayo viṣayā mahāmudrāniṣpattau mantramudrādhiṣṭhitānāṃ yogināṃ viśiṣṭataraṃ phalamutpādayantīti sadbhiravadheyam |
1426:32: yato na vai kiñcidekaṃ janakamapitu sāmagrī janikā,
1426:33: tena viśiṣṭāt kāraṇā[ntarā]d hi viśiṣṭameva kāryamutpadyate,
1426:35: [prayogaḥ]- tatra ya ime viśiṣṭakāraṇābhi saṃskṛtāste viśiṣṭameva kāryamārabhante,
1426:42: tad tad asati pratibandhake akāraṇavaikalye viśiṣṭakāraṇāntarābhi saṃskārād viśiṣṭameva kārya bhavati iti,
1426:44: tasya tasmāt siddhe vyāpyavyāpakabhāve vyāpake sādhye vyāpyaṃ hetuḥ |
1426:45: tadyathā-vyāpake vṛkṣādike sādhye vyāpyaṃ śiśapādiḥ hetuḥ |
1426:46: siddhatvād vyāpyavyāpaka-bhāvasya na kalpe datra kāraṇaṃ vyāpya-vyāpaka-bhāvāt param |
1426:55: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṅgā ca matirbhavet |
1426:56: vicikitsā naiva karttavyā tasyedaṃ sidhyate dhruvam ||5||
1426:63: na caitacchakyate vaktuṃ yathaite rūpādayo viṣayāḥ kleśaprasūti-hetutvādapāyahetava iti |
1426:70: yadi punaḥ viṣayāḥ sarvadā rāgahetava eva tadā kathaṃ samviparītajñānamapi janayanti aśucyādibhirākāraiḥ,
1426:73: evaṃ viṣayāḥ viśiṣṭasamāropād viśiṣṭapariṇāmācca viśiṣṭaphalaniṣpattau hetubhāvaṃ pratipadyanta iti kiṃ na iṣyate?yathā -
1426:75: aśuciḥ kāminī bhakṣyā iti tisro vikalpanāḥ ||9||
1426:76: na ca ete'pi viśiṣṭasamāropāḥ tathāpariṇāmācca saṃsārabandhahetukā bhavanti iti,
1426:78: yasmād trimaṇḍalapariśuddheḥ mantra-mudrāpariṇāmaḥ tasmānmantrādibhirāhitaviśeṣā rūpādayo viṣayā anuttarameva phalaṃ kurvanti |
1426:79: yathā viṣādikaṃ mantrādibhiḥ saṃskṛtyopabhujyamānamanyadeva rasāyanādikaṃ phalamāvahata iti,
1426:81: evaṃ viṣayā api mantra mudrādhiṣṭhitā viśiṣṭatarameva phalaṃ vikurvantīti sutarāmavavoddhavyam |
1426:83: rāgo dveṣaśca mohaśca trayaite viṣamaṃ gatāḥ |
1426:89: evameva yo bodhisattvasya kleśa saṃkarakūṭaḥ saḥ sarvajñatāyām upakārībhūto bhavati |
1426:90: tadyathā kāśyapa mantrauṣadhiparigṛhītaṃ viṣaṃ na nighātayati evameva prajñopāyasamanvitobodhisattvaḥ |
1426:97: punaścoktam upāliparipṛcchāsūtre - rāgo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvārthatāyāṃ saṃvartate,
1426:99: sāmagrībhedāt kāryabheda- darśanād dharmanairātmyāvabodhācca na tatrābhiniveśaḥ kayañcidapi,
1426:102: tattaireva sukhairāhāravihārādibhistatphalamabhimukhīkriyate yasya puraḥ saraṃ vibhavaḥ sa sādṛśaḥ syāt |
1426:112: nātiśaucaṃ na niyamo na tapo na ca duṣkaraiḥ |
1426:114: yathā,bhagavatā rūpādayaḥ tannirjātāḥ sukhapariṇāmanāḥ anuttaraphalaheturuktāḥ tathā sparśanirjātasukhapariṇāmanā api |
1426:120: ye hi prajñopāyarahitā ātmātmīyagrahābhiniveśena pariṇāmanānabhijñāḥ sparśaviśeṣaṃ saṃsevante,
1426:123: bhikṣubhāve sthitā ye ca ye ca tarkaratā narāḥ |
1426:124: vṛddhabhāve sthitā ye ca teṣāṃ tattvaṃ na deśayet ||16||
1426:125: bhagavatā tān prati sandhārya pratiṣedha uktaḥ |
1426:131: śrāvakānāṃ mahāvīreṇā va tārāya teṣu vai ||18||
1426:132: na tu prajñopāyaparigṛhītamūrtīnāṃ viśiṣṭaphalānveṣiṇāṃ viśiṣṭa pariṇāmanāphalamanubhavatāṃ paramārthadharmatattvāvabodhāt manāmapi teṣāṃ taddoṣabhāgitā bhavati,
1426:133: kintu mativiśeṣeṇa samanvitāḥ santoṣasya cānuttarasya lābhino bhavanti,
1426:138: saṅkalpād bodhisattvānāṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vā'śubham |
1426:139: sarva kalyāṇatāmeti teṣāṃ vaśyaṃ yato manaḥ ||19||
1426:140: tena saṅkalpakṛteṣu puṇyāpuṇyeṣu yasya viśiṣṭa eva kāraṇāntara kṛtasaṅkalpaviśeṣaḥ,
1426:141: rūpādiṣu sa tasmādāśayaviśeṣād viśiṣṭameva phalaṃ tasya avaśyamakāmakairapi parairapyupagantavyam iti |
1426:150: dṛśyate spṛśyate caiva yathā māyā hi sarvataḥ |
1426:151: na copalabhyate caivaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ sthitiḥ |
1426:154: yaireva mūḍhā vadhyante buddhāḥ krīḍanti tairiha |
1426:181: sarva śūnyapade yojyaṃ tapo hyeṣa mahātmanām ||32||
1426:188: teṣāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vilāsārthaṃ ca sṛṣṭavān ||35||
1426:191: darpaṇaprativimbaṃ ca svapnaṃ māyāṃ ca budbudam |
1426:192: indrajālaṃ ca sadṛśaṃ yaḥ paśyet sa prabhuḥ smṛtaḥ ||37||
1426:196: tena na kasyacit sthitirasti yatrābhiniveśaḥ syāt |
1426:197: 'yadā caivaṃbhūtairapi māyopamaiḥ bhāvairviśiṣṭasaṃbhogasañjātasukhasparśa -pariṇāmata na yā kiñcid viśiṣṭaphalaṃ prāpyate,
1426:201: yadi ete viśiṣṭabhāvanābhyāsabalād viśiṣṭasukhasaumanasyādikakāryeṣu āryānuttaraphalāvāptihetubhāvaṃ pratipadyante,
1426:219: bhikṣāśinā na japtavyaṃ na ca bhaikṣyaratirbhavet |
1426:223: tena prakṛtiprabhāsvara-sphaṭikopalasadṛśe manasi rūpādibhirā hitasaṃskāraviśeṣa-sukhasaumanasyalakṣaṇaḥ saḥ tatra prajñopāyaparigṛhītasyābhyāsaviśeṣabalāt prakarṣaparyantarūpatāmāsādayediti |
1426:225: śabdādi viṣayānubhavasañjātasaṃskāraviśeṣa to yogijñānam asakṛdbhāvanābhyāsasāmarthyāt samāhita paramaśāśvatasvabhāvaṃ bhāvanāprakarṣaparyanta māyāt |
1426:234: tena tadatra sāmagrī bhāvanatayā vyavasthitaṃ tadviruddhasya duḥkhāde ra vakāśamapākaroti |
1426:237: evam anayorapi sukhaduḥkhayorna caikatra santānātmani kathamapi sambhavaḥ,
1426:239: tena sukhasaumanasyādi sātmīkaraṇe naiva duḥkhādīnāṃ kathamapi sambhāva nī yatāmāropayati iti yuktamuktam - svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhiḥ tadrūpābhāvaṃ pratipādayati |
1426:243: kiñca bhāvyamānānāmapi yadi viśeṣāṇāṃ tāvadapi nivṛttiriṣyate,
1426:244: tadā pṛthvīkṛtsnādikamapi bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantavartināṃ tathaiva nivṛttimāpādayed iti |
1426:245: na ceṣyate,yasmād ye prakarṣaparyantavartitayā svātmalābhabhāvāḥ na teṣāmāvartanam,
1426:250: ye tu doṣādayo vyāvṛttibhāginaḥ teṣāṃ ca tadānīṃ nāyaṃ bhāvaḥ |
1426:253: anyathā mokṣānantaramapi saṃsāraḥ syād iti na ceṣyate prayujyateḥ vā |
1426:254: ye mokṣaṃ prāptasya saṃsārotpatti neṣyante eva te'
1426:260: tathā sukhaprakarṣaparyantagamanānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ cittasyāpi na jāyate,
1426:262: tataḥ yena yena vāsyate tatra tatra cābhyāsabalād viśiṣṭatarasvabhāvamāviṣkaroti aparāvṛttidharmatālakṣaṇam |
1426:264: yena yena hi bhāvena manaḥ saṃyujyate nṛṇām |
1426:266: tena sarvametad viśiṣṭapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmyamāne viśiṣṭaphalāvāhakaṃ bhavati iti |
1426:273: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyānulepanāni dadāti tathāgateṣu tathāgatacaityeṣu vā |
1426:276: tatra buddhakṣetreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ divyāḥ sparśaviśeṣāḥ abhiniṣpadyantām |
1426:279: manoratha - saṅkalpenaiva iṣṭān pañcakāmaguṇān buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakasaṅghānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ copanāmayeyam |
1426:280: tasyaivaṃ sañjānata evaṃ bhavati -anena kuśalamūlena mama buddhakṣetre anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambuddhasya śrāvakasaṅghasya satvānāṃ ca manoratha - saṅkalpenaiva iṣṭāḥ kāmaguṇāḥ prādurbhavantu |
1426:282: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasattvaiḥ sārddha samyaksambuddhebhyo vā pañcakāmaguṇadānaṃ dadāti evamādi|
1426:284: mātuluṅgādi phalaṃ loke yathā lākṣādisekād uktarūpam,
1426:285: tathā cāsya citasya bāhya-sparśādisevanāt tadeva sukhādikaṃ saṃskāraviśeṣaprativedhāhitaviśeṣatvāt punaḥ tatraiva abhimukhībhavati |
1426:287: tadapi yathā dhattūrakarpāsa vīja dāḍimādīnāṃ kāraṇāntarairāhitaviśeṣaṃ tatra tathaiva phalaṃ pratīyate,
1426:299: na tatra tattvaṃ vidyate nendriyārthā na dhātavaḥ |
1426:300: na manaścaittakaṃ nāpi nāhaṅkāro na dhīrapi ||50||
1426:301: na ca sattvaṃ na ca prajñā na cittaṃ naiva kiñcit |
1426:303: na saṃjñā na ca ceṣṭā tu na rūpaṃ na guṇaḥ kvacit |
1426:304: nirvāṇaṃ tatsamuddiṣṭaṃ mokṣaṃ tu niṣkalaṃ bhavet || 52||
1426:306: tadā prabuddho vijñeyo nirvāṇaṃ yadi necchati ||53||
1426:308: nirvāṇaṃ yaḥ prapadyeta vinā siddhiṃ na vīryavān ||54||
1426:310: yaḥ parāṃ bodhimāsādhya vinā siddheḥ prahīyate ||55||
1426:311: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ caureṇātmāpahāriṇā |
1426:313: na tasya vidyate vīryaṃ na ca sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam |
1426:315: nānyo hīnatarastasmāt nānyaḥ syād durjano janaḥ |
1426:320: nāsti tattvavrataṃ puṃsāṃ mahāphala pradaṃ yataḥ |
1426:325: na kṛtaghnatastvanye ye prabodhiṃ gatā narāḥ |
1426:333: dahyate dṛśyate naiva gacchanno dhūma eva vā ||65||
1426:336: prayogaśca- ye ye prāptaprakarṣaparyantāḥ na te vyāvartante |
1426:340: itaraśca - ye hi bhāvyante te bhāvanābhyāsasāmarthyāt samāhitaparamaprakarṣaparyantavartino bhavanti,
1426:347: na punastadanyena kenacid api vyāvartate tatsvabhāvatāmupagataḥ |
1426:348: tadyathā- kāṣṭhādau agnidāhitā viśeṣā na tadvyāvartante,
1426:351: na puna rdāhataḥ kiñcid vikārajananaṃ kvacit |
1426:353: hemādau agnikṛta viśeṣaḥ tatsantānavyāvṛttau tadviparītakāraṇataḥ tatsvabhāvabhāvaṃ sampāditaḥ yathā agnijalādiḥ |
1426:354: akhilahuta suvarṇasya asyāpi anya eva kaṭhinasvabhāvādhyāsitaviśeṣaḥ sañjāyate svabhāvādhivāsitaviśeṣāntara utpadyate |
1426:356: taduttarottaraṃ tasyaiva kāraṇasya saṃsevanena parāṃ niṣṭhām āsādyamānasya na vyāvṛttiḥ,
1426:358: yena buddhirhi tadanuraktā satī samāsāditaguṇā ca tadeva kāraṇam ādatte,
1426:359: tadviparīte ca vimukhyān na kathañcid vyāvartate |
1426:364: tadyathā - kasyacit śrotriyasya mahāvratadhāriṇo nairghṛṇyaṃ bhāvanāsātmīkaraṇāt tatsāmyamāsādayati tacca svasaṃvedyaṃ sukhasaumanasyādi sarvasantānavarti svasaṃvedanapratyakṣaṃ siddhaṃ,
1426:366: pravāhaviccheda kāraṇābhāvāt duḥkhādi pravāha vicchitikāraṇāni naṃ saṃvidyante |
1426:370: prekṣāvān kvacid anyathā prekṣāvān na syāt,
1426:373: kintu kiñcinmātra sevanenāpi buddhi staddhitānubandhitvāt tadviparītakāraṇārthamiha kathamapi na sañjāyate |
1426:374: na hi kaścijjānanneva ahiviṣa kaṇṭakādīn upādatte |
1426:376: tāni ca heyarūpatayā buddhyā prāgeva nirastāni,
1426:380: bhāvanāviśeṣeṇāpi viśiṣṭatā labhyate prajñādīnāṃ tenābhyāsastāvad vidyate |
1426:382: yena sukhasaumanasyādyabhyasyamānaṃ na tadvipakṣe duḥkhādauṃ pravartate |
1426:386: yena ime prajñāśilpakalādayaḥ pratipuruṣābhyāsatayā bheda viśeṣam āsādyamānāḥ saṃlakṣyate |
1426:396: hattvā rāgaṃ virāgaṃ ca sarvasaukhyaṃ vadanti te ||68||
1426:400: kiñca evamuktaṃ bhagavatā śīlapaṭale - bodhisattvena daśakuśalānyapi parārthena khaṇḍayitavyāni |
1426:401: yathā-kācit kāmārthinī strī bodhisattvaṃ prati prāṇān tyajet,
1426:406: tad yadi ete rāgādayaḥ prakṛtisāvadyāstadā kathaṃ durgatihetavo na bhavanti ?
1426:410: yathā ketakīpuṣpaṃ gandhahastinopabhuktaṃ kastūrikādi bhāvena pariṇamate,
1426:421: hetu prayogaḥ - ye ye viśiṣṭasantānabhāginaḥ te te viśiṣṭaphalāvāhakāḥ,
1426:430: tadatrāpi viśiṣṭapariṇāmān nānyadapekṣata iti tanmātrānubandha uktaḥ |
1426:437: tatsāmībhāvamupagataṃ bhāvasaṃviśiṣṭameva rūpāntaraṃ janayati tathā tāmrādiṣu sthirīkṛtapāradādi rasāvedhasāmarthyādanyadevāvasthāntaraṃ janayate |
1426:444: ramajātamatīva vedhanīyaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ gṛhṇata bodhicitta saṃjñam ||69||
1426:446: puṇyena sukhitaḥ kāyaḥ pāṇḍityena manaḥ sukhi |
1426:447: tiṣṭhan parārtha saṃsāre dayāluḥ kena khidyate ||70||
1426:448: kiñca,yayā rasāyanikaḥ dhanikaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścid viśiṣṭauṣadhisaṃyogāt samāsāditatadguṇamāhātmyaḥ,
1426:450: tathā'nye ca guṇāḥ āsaṃsāraṃ sthiti kurvanti,
1426:451: evameva viśiṣṭaviṣayaparibhogasañjāta rasāyanasya āsaṃsāra-prakṛta-praṇidhividhānasya parārthaparasya samāhitasakala guṇagaṇasya pratividdhabodhicittarasasya kimiti sattvaṃ neṣyate?kiṃ ca -
1426:452: na bodhi niḥkleśāṃ kṛtagati ravāpnoti paramāṃ
1426:455: na nirdagdhāḥ kleśāḥ tṛṇalavaladhutvaṃ tu gamitāḥ ||71||
1426:458: anenaivaṃ tvaddhīstadanu na kṛtā bhrāntaviṣayā guṇānāṃ kṣetratvaṃ jagati janidhārā api kṛtāḥ ||72||
1426:463: na hi savikalpakād vijñānāt nirvikalpakasya jñānasya prasūtiḥ kathamapi sambhavati |
1426:466: yataḥ kleśopakleśavāsanānivṛttau kimaparamasti yad vikalpakaṃ syāt,
1426:475: grāhya- grāhakākāradvayavinirmuktajñānaṃ vinā bhāvi kāryākhyaṃ svabhāvākhyaṃ vā liṅgaṃ na upalabhyate |
1426:489: neyārthā sā tvayā nātha !bhāṣitā samvṛtistu sā ||74||
1426:495: na cāparo heturiṣyate pramāṇāntaraśceti kuto nirvikalpakasya jñānasya niścayo vācyaḥ?tathoktam -
1426:500: na hi gaganāmbhoruhādīnāṃ savikalpakatvaṃ nirvikalpakatvaṃ vā iṣyate,
1426:505: na ca sādhyamakurvāṇaṃ sādhanaṃ tatra kīrtyate |
1426:506: tasmāt sarvameva jñānaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ grāhyagrāhakākārarūpatayā vartamānaṃ savikalpakamiti pratijānīmahe,
1426:509: āryo na paśyati bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare |
1426:511: bhrānti vidhūya sarvāṃ hi nimittaṃ jāyate yadi |
1426:512: saiva tasya bhaved bhrāntiraśuddhaṃ timiraṃ yathā ||77||
1426:517: tatsamānajātīyapravāha pravṛttaṃ grāhyagrāhakākārasaṃvidbhedena yuktaṃ adhyavasita svarūpamavicchinna santānaṃ dharmakaṃ svacitta-vaśitāprāptaṃ savikalpakamapi yathāvasthitasakalapadārthaparicchedakam,
1426:520: na me yānaṃ mahāyānaṃ na ghoṣo na ca akṣarāḥ |
1426:521: na ca dhyānaṃ vimokṣo vai na nirābhāsagocaram ||78||
1426:526: arthānvayavyatirekānukāri savikalpakam api jñānaṃ aspaṣṭābham uktam ācārya - dharmakīrtipādairapi laukikapramāṇa parīkṣāyām |
1426:537: atha grāhya-grāhaka-saṃvityākāratayā ābhāsa mānasya jñānasya prakarṣaparyantagamane sarvavityarthamiṣyate,
1426:541: na hi nirābhāsasya jñānasya kathamapi paricchedakatvaṃ vidyate,
1426:545: atha svabhāva eva tasyāyaṃ yat tatprakarṣaparyantagamane sarvasaṃvittau sa svabhāvo'
1426:547: tathā hi grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedenabhidyamānasyāpi prakarṣaparyantagamane tadeva viśiṣṭarūpaṃ jāyate |
1426:549: tasya tatsāmarthya kiṃ kākena bhakṣitam kiñca,
1426:554: evāti bhāvyate tattadeva bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamane tatsātmatāmāpādayati-tadyathā śrotriyajātibhāvādau ghṛṇām |
1426:555: bhāvyate ca sarvameva trailokyaṃ tadupabhogatayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ |
1426:566: bhāvyante sarvadā tattrailokyāntaravarttinaḥ padārthāḥ sukhasaumanasyādisādhanatvena sthitāḥ |
1426:576: tena savikalpakamapi jñānaṃ bhāvanāsāmarthyanirjātaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣabhājinam aśeṣaguṇālayam -
1426:581: jñāte tasmin bhavet sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ tattvasaṃjñitam ||89||
